mapper.select: SELECT work_sch_type_num, work_name, rank_table.code_value rankValue, dept_table.code_value deptValue FROM work_schedule_type INNER JOIN code_table rank_table ON work_schedule_type.rank = rank_table.code_name INNER JOIN code_table dept_table ON work_schedule_type.dept = dept_table.code_name
mapper.insert: insert into work_schedule_type(work_sch_type_num, work_name, dept, rank) values (work_schedule_type_seq.nextval,#{work_name},#{dept},#{rank})
mapper.update: update work_schedule_type set work_name = #{work_name}, dept = #{dept}, rank = #{rank} where work_sch_type_num = #{work_sch_type_num}
